item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://vatcheckapi.com - Simple and free VAT number validation API. 500 free requests per month.

item.title: Add napkin.io
item.description: https://www.napkin.io/ - FaaS with 1Gb of memory, a default timeout of 15 seconds and 1,000,000 free API calls/month.

item.title: add 1.1.1.1
item.description: https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests - Free public DNS Resolver which is fast and secure (encrypt your DNS query), provided by CloudFlare. Useful to bypass your internet provider's DNS blocking, prevent DNS query spying, and [to block adult & malware content](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/1.1.1.1-for-families). Can also be used [via API](https://developers.cloudflare.com/1.1.1.1/encrypted-dns/dns-over-https/make-api-requests). Note: Just a DNS resolver, not a DNS hoster.

item.title: add pravatar
item.description: https://pravatar.cc/ - Generate random/placeholder fake avatar, which url can be directly hotlinked in your web/app.

item.title: add UIAvatars
item.description: https://ui-avatars.com/ - - Generate avatars with initials from names. Which the urls can be directly hotlinked in your web/app. Support config parameters via the url.

item.title: add combinatronics
item.description: https://combinatronics.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev/master/index.html - Convert your Github hosted assets (images, CSS, JS, etc.) into CDN assets. Can even render HTML files, for [example from this repo](https://combinatronics.com/ripienaar/free-for-dev/master/index.html). Similar to rawgit.com and raw.githack.com.

item.title: add freeflarum
item.description: https://freeflarum.com/) - Community powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove watermark from footer - Community powered free Flarum hosting for up to 250 users (donate to remove watermark from footer).

item.title: Added ipaddress.sh
item.description: https://about.ipaddress.sh/ - Simple service to get public IP address in different [formats](https://about.ipaddress.sh/).

item.title: Add ray.so
item.description: https://ray.so/ - Create beautiful images of your code snippets.

item.title: add mocky - simple http response mock generator
item.description: https://github.com/julien-lafont/Mocky - A simple web app to generate custom HTTP responses for mocking HTTP request. Also available as [open source](https://github.com/julien-lafont/Mocky).

item.title: add quicktype.io - typesafe code generator
item.description: https://quicktype.io/ - Quickly auto generate models/class/type/interface and serializers from JSON, schema, and GraphQL for working with data quickly & safely in any programming language. Convert JSON into gorgeous, typesafe code in any language.
